meanings.sent1: The love between the couple eternises their bond.
meanings.sent2: The artist's masterpiece eternises their talent for generations to come.
meanings.sent3: The magical spell eternises the happiness in the enchanted forest.
meanings.sent4: The old tree eternises the wisdom of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The photograph eternises the joy of the family reunion.

meanings.sent1: The preservation method eternises the freshness of the food.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ruins eternises the history of the civilization.
meanings.sent3: The time capsule eternises the memories of the school children.
meanings.sent4: The melody eternises the emotions of the composer.
meanings.sent5: The legacy eternises the impact of the great leader.
